titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to qualify additional institutions for programs under part B of title III of that Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committee.name: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities

committee.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
committee.name: House Economic and Educational Opportunities

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to qualify additional institutions for programs for strengthening historically Black colleges and universities. Makes eligible for such programs an institution in a State where no other institution meets all program eligibility requirements, if it meets all such requirements except that it was established during or after 1964 but before 1978.
